data.meaning_mnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> with a <radical>spoon</radical> is a powerful thing. Even something as ordinary as a spoon can create great <kanji>change</kanji> in the world when given to the right person.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine your leader-hero holding a spoon out, then doing something awesome with it to totally change everything for the better. It's amazing the change this person can bring about with such a simple, everyday object!
data.reading_mnemonic: Then, this hero of yours takes their spoon and says some magic words into it, <kanji>changing</kanji> it into a <reading>car</reading> (か).
data.reading_hint: Of course, doing something like this is utterly amazing. Feel amazed in your imagination, because if you don't, then it'll be hard to remember the reading for this kanji. If you are amazed, you'll know that spoons going to cars = the reading is か, so make sure you take the time to be amazed.
